casebody.data:
ASSUMPTION PARISH POLICE JURY, et al.
v.
TEXAS BRINE COMPANY, LLC, et al. State of Louisiana
v.
Texas Brine Company, LLC, et al. Assumption Parish Sheriff Mike Haguespack
v.
Texas Brine Company, LLC NO. 2018-CC-0311 Supreme Court of Louisiana. February 23, 2018

Stay denied. Writ denied.
